title: Finger prints not saving and I can't set it up again
content:
I used the have a Moto e4+ and I setup my finger print and it worked fine for a while but all of the sudden I couldn't unlock my phone with my finger print and when I add the same finger it asked me to use a different finger.
I got a Nokia 6 and the same thing happens. Please fix this I loved useing my finger print to unlock my phone because face scanning sucks.

(Phone Information)
Moto e4+ 
Android ver: 7.1.1
Security patch: idk but I think it's april 2019 
Nokia 6 (2017 ver)
Android ver: 9
Security patch: April 1 2020
